mapper.insert: INSERT INTO talentQna(num, tboardNum, userId, secret, question, showQuestion, locked, questionDate) VALUES(talentQna_seq.NEXTVAL, #{tboardNum}, #{userId}, #{secret}, #{question}, 1, 0, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM talentQna WHERE tboardNum = #{tboardNum} AND showQuestion = 1 AND locked = 0
